website_summaries.verdict: Larger Ariel doll that is ideal for toddlers and has high quality features and accessories.
pros: Doll includes gown, tiara, and shoes
Her dress is high quality with lots of unique details and her eyes look realistic – not just painted on
Many other Disney princesses are also available in this line of dolls
cons: Shoes can fall off and some say the hair tangles easily

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Got here super fast. Looks just like the photo. My grandaughters going to be so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well made
customer_reviews.text: This doll is well made and has withstood my 4 year old playing with it almost daily (for about three months now). I found it a bit weird that the legs don't hinge at the waist...so you can't make her set. Other than that it's perfect. *I would suggest putting the hair back in a hair tie to help keep the hair from getting tangled/crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best Disney Toddler Princess
customer_reviews.text: I got this on Black Friday for a great deal, like half the price..and she was more than worth it! Ariel's hair is super soft and the attention to detail with her dress and everything really is great! My daughter loves her! I plan on getting the whole collection for her.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Russell

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and how gorgeous she looks in person. Very pleased little girl on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: FAHAD

customer_reviews.title: Cute Ariel
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my friends daughter and she loved it. Very durable but not easy her to sit with her mermaid tale.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters are obsessed with dolls and Disney Princesses. These dolls are tall and quality made. My girls love them. We have several and will continue to buy. At this price point they are also easy on the checkbook!
customer_reviews.author: Krysten R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Doll
customer_reviews.text: I recently attended a 2 year old girl’s birthday party and my gift was the hit of the party! She loved this beautiful doll and never let go of it once she unwrapped it. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: westielady

customer_reviews.title: Such a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old daughter as she loves princesses. I am so happy with this doll. It looks exactly like the picture and most importantly my daughter loves it. Will definitely be buying more in the collection, she wants the Tiana doll next!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Great for young toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I got this doll for my 15 month old because I got different Ariel doll for my older daughter and I didn’t want them fighting
customer_reviews.author: MD mom

customer_reviews.title: Great value for such a pretty doll!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute doll! My daughter loves it! Her is amazing beautiful♡
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect doll for my 5 year old daughter. Well made
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with mermaids! This toy is absolutely perfect and has a great price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Hair on the doll falling off
customer_reviews.text: The hair on the dolling are falling off within first few minutes. poor construction. Also, unpacking the doll was a huge task.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful doll but the box it comes in was so smashed and damaged. The amazon box was fine. But Ariel's box was totally trashed. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas so I hope she likes it
customer_reviews.author: brianna gore

customer_reviews.title: Great doll
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful doll, my niece loved it! Great material, soft hair. Worth the money :)
customer_reviews.author: vinicius

customer_reviews.title: Doll looks nothing like Disney
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and looks nothing like Ariel. Don’t understand at all.
customer_reviews.author: SHAWNA

customer_reviews.title: What a cute doll
customer_reviews.text: A very cute doll. Well made. Loved a lot by a certain little girl
customer_reviews.author: R. Stroud

product_meta.title: Disney Princess Explore Your World Ariel Doll Large Toddler
product_meta.description: Disney Princess explore your world Ariel doll is dressed in her royal gown and tiara. Ariel needs a friend to explore the world and share adventures together; Help her become a part of your world; Doll is articulated on the neck, shoulder, and hips. Her dress has embellished bodice with multi-color sublimation prints enhanced with satin and glitter net layers. Skirts depicts scenes from her world in a soft watercolor finish. Includes: doll, tiara, gown and fashion shoes. Designed for ages 3+
feature_bullets: Dressed in her royal embellished gown and tiara
Gown has beautiful glitter sequence with multi color Sublimation prints enhanced with satin and glitter
Skirts depicts scenes from her world in a soft watercolor finish
Doll is articulated on the neck, shoulder, and hips
Includes: doll, gown, tiara and fashion shoes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars507 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
